name: Amazing Frog?
detailed_description:
Amazing Frog? is the original funny mayhem sandbox game. Head to Swindon, UK where everyone’s favorite superhero Amazing Frog? spends all of his chaotic days.

Explore Swindon, Do Crimes





Amazing Frog? might be Swindon’s very own superhero, but he gets up to some mayhem when the time is right. Flop around town on a variety of vehicles including cars, jet skis, helicopters, biplanes, moon buggies and more. Run over to the fully fitted fart gym for some exercise or dive into the water for a nice swim. The world is yours for the taking!

I’m bored. Hello bored, I’m Frog





Swindon’s superhero loves a good adventure and there’s loads to get up to if you know the right place to look. When in doubt, definitely do the thing. Amazing Frog? V2 features items such as: balloons, toy guns, baseball bats, crossbows and exploding barrel bombs*.

As part of the current process, the Amazing Frog? team is working on bringing loads of features from the legacy version of the game to Amazing Frog V2. That means you’ll be able to also rescue cats, earn Swindon Citizen Points (SCP), earn frog milk coffee tokens, feed the pondemon, enjoy the flys blood world and snow world and much more!

*Bombs not recommended for tadpole play

The Wilderness Frogsplorer





Frogs aren’t the only ones getting up to no good in Swindon. Hop into a boat and you might just come across a deadly shark. We recommend steering clear of them or, even better, steering INTO them.

If you’ve got more exotic tastes, the tourism board of Swindon recommends NOT going into the sewers. (We are not part of the tourism board and, therefore, heavily encourage it. You may just find that they open up “out of this world” possibilities.)

Hello, is it Frog You’re Looking For?





Everyone gets a little lonely sometimes and that’s why Amazing Frog? invited all his friends along to participate in the mayhem. Amazing Frog? V2 offers four player local multiplayer and four player remote play. Get by with a little help from your frogs. You can even battle your friends in versus mode if you’re looking for a friendly challenge!

short_description: Amazing Frog? is the original open world buffet of bonkers physics sandbox…ness for up to four players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.5 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Amazing Frog? is in Constant development and so as we add more to the game these figure may change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8+
  • Processor: 2.5GHZ Quad core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Amazing Frog? is in Constant development and so as we add more to the game these figure may change

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Processor: 2.0 GHZ dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Processor: 2.5GHZ Quad core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: i5 2 GHZ quad Core
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: i7 quad Core
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
